subclusters.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial dysfunction as the main source of ROS causing oxidative damage and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes mitochondrial ROS production, mtDNA damage, and apoptosis in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights mitochondrial oxidative phosphorylation inefficiency, ROS accumulation, and mitonuclear interactions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial ROS, especially hydrogen peroxide, as critical aging drivers mitigated by catalase.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial ROS as causal agents and lifespan extension by mitochondrial-targeted catalase.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details mitochondrial ROS production, detoxification, and dysfunction driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mitochondrial respiratory chain cysteine content to oxidative damage and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial ROS and redox imbalance causing neuromuscular aging and sarcopenia.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Broadly covers free radicals causing cellular damage and antioxidant mitigation without mitochondrial focus.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on ROS as causal agents, oxidative stress balance, and genetic/environmental modulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes ROS damage and antioxidant defense mechanisms correlating with lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes ROS accumulation, oxidative damage, and antioxidant enzyme responses in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights ROS-induced somatic damage and balance with antioxidant defenses.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details free radicals and ROS/RNS as initiators of aging, including lipid peroxidation and dietary factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress causing protein oxidation and sarcopenia, with antioxidant glutathione role.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses ROS accumulation, antioxidant enzymes like SOD, and their effects on lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers oxidative damage, pro-oxidant/antioxidant imbalance, and degenerative disease contribution.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Extends free radical theory to redox-based global oxidative stress network and catalytic antioxidants.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Examines antioxidant enzyme activities and their correlation with longevity across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative damage to proteins and the role of repair mechanisms in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: General Oxidative Stress and Antioxidant Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses endogenous oxygen radicals causing oxidative damage and antioxidant defenses in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage-Driven Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes free radical-induced DNA damage accumulation and antioxidant supplementation reducing DNA damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage-Driven Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress to DNA damage and genetic instability syndromes with progeroid features.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage-Driven Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes oxidative stress inducing premature senescence via PTRF/cavin-1 and p53/p21 pathway activation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage-Driven Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects ROS accumulation to oxidative injury affecting DNA and reproductive aging.
